description: This dashboard to present JMeter Overview

targets.query:
aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["result"] == "pass")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["scenario","userLocation","connectionType","btpLocation","s4hLocation"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["s4hLocation"], columnKey: ["userLocation"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with Details: "⏵"}))
  |> group()

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["scenario","userLocation","btpLocation","s4hLocation"])
  |> mean()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["btpLocation"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> group()

aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 
from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["result"] == "pass")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["userLocation","s4hLocation"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["s4hLocation"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> group()

aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 
from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] != "-")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["btpLocation","userLocation"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["btpLocation"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> group()

aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 
from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["userLocation","scenario"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["scenario"], valueColumn: "_value")   
  |> group()

aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 
from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["userLocation","connectionType"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["connectionType"], valueColumn: "_value")   
  |> group()

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dataType"] == "TC")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)  
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v:60)) }))

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "receivedBytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dataType"] == "TC")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)  
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: 60)) }))

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "allThreads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> max()

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dataType"] == "TC")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dataType"] == "TC")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["result"] == "pass")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)

  |> group(columns: ["requestName","userLocation"])

aggregate = if  ${aggregation} > 0 then (tables=<-) => tables |>  quantile(q: ${aggregation}) else (tables=<-) => tables |>  mean() 
from(bucket: "performance")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dataType"] != "TC") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["result"] == "pass")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["userLocation"] =~ /${userLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["btpLocation"] =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["s4hLocation"] =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["region"] == "${region}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] =~ /${type:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["scenario"] =~ /${scenario:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] =~ /${request:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["connectionType"] =~ /${connectionType:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["requestName","userLocation"])
  |> aggregate()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["userLocation"], columnKey: ["requestName"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> group()

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "performance",
  tag: "region",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "requestsRaw",
  start: v.timeRangeStart,
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)
list.description: You can filter the data using scenario name
list.label: Region
list.name: region

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "performance",
  tag: "type",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "requestsRaw" and r.region == "${region}",
  start: v.timeRangeStart,
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "performance",
  tag: "requestName",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "requestsRaw" and r.region == "${region}" and r.type == "${type}" and r.scenario =~ /${scenario:regex}/ and r.userLocation =~ /${userLocation:regex}/ and r.btpLocation =~ /${btpLocation:regex}/ and r.s4hLocation =~ /${s4hLocation:regex}/ and r.dataType == "TC",
  start: v.timeRangeStart,
  stop: v.timeRangeStop
)

title: Overview
